prompts.prompt: Tell me about yourself
Tell me about any resume gaps.
What have you been working on?
Where do you see yourself in 3 - 5 years?
What is your biggest strength and weakness?
What is an interesting thing about you that is not on your resume?
How are you different professionally versus personally?
Why do you want to leave your current role / company?
What are you looking for in your next role / company?
What environment do you work best in?
What do you like most about your job?
Who was your favourite manager and why?
Tell me about a time you had a conflict with your manager or coworker
Describe a time where you worked with someone you didn't get along with
Describe a time you mentored a fellow developer
Tell me about a project you are most proud of
Tell me about a project you made outside of work
What was the most challenging project you solved in your career?
Describe a time where you made a technical tradeoff
How have you influenced a product or design direction?
Tell me about a time you received negative feedback
How do you handle criticism and negative feedback?
How do you keep up with learning new technology?
Tell me about a time you learned something on the job
Tell me about a time you solved a challenging problem
When did you proactively work on something without permission?
Describe a problem you found and proactively resolved
How do you solve problems, especially with unknowns?
Describe a time where you struggled to complete a task
Describe a time where you made a mistake at work
Describe a time where you were stressed out at work
Tell me about a time when your work was blocked. What did you do?
How do you manage being pulled in many different directions?
How do you decide what to work on each day?
How do you know when a task is done?
How do you balance getting work done quickly vs doing things well?
When have you shown leadership?
Describe a time where you led by example
Describe a time where you sold others on an idea
Describe a time you adapted to a new way of working
Describe a project that changed significantly. How did you adapt?
Describe a time where you took a risk. How did it turn out?
How have you moved your career forward?
What is a goal you wanted? How did you achieve it?
